training::couchbase101.title: Fundamentals of Couchbase Server
training::couchbase101.subtitle: Architecture, Installation, Configuration and Monitoring
training::couchbase101.description:
* Couchbase Architecture
* Setup parameters and options
* Admin Console
* Monitoring Graphs and what they mean
* Buckets
* RAM/CPU/IO Writers
* Scaling, Clustering and Rebalancing
* Couchbase in the Cloud
* Using AMI installations
* References to Docs, Communities, etc.

training::couchbase102.title: SDK Operations
training::couchbase102.subtitle: Operations for Connecting to Couchbase and Storing & Retrieving Data
training::couchbase102.description:
* Understanding how to setup SDK for languages and different platforms
* JSON serialization/deserialization
* How Operations work in Couchbase Architecture
* Making a Connection to Couchbase
* Document Operations in Couchbase
* Optimistic Concurrency
* Pessimistic Concurrency
* Durability with Observe

vimeo.embed: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations from scalabl3 on Vimeo.

training::couchbase103.title: Document Modeling
training::couchbase103.subtitle: Understand data storage strategies and patterns
training::couchbase103.description:
* Differences with RDBMS
* ORM's and ActiveRecord
* Simple vs Complex Data Types
* JSON serialization/deserialization
* Key Patterns
* Advanced Operations
* Dynamic Schema Change Strategies
* Document Tips that help with Views

vimeo.title: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations
vimeo.embed: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations from scalabl3 on Vimeo.

training::couchbase104.title: Views and Indexing
training::couchbase104.subtitle: Learn about Views -- Secondary Indexes created through Map/Reduce Technique
training::couchbase104.description:
Learn the architecture and use of Views, the structure of Map-Reduce functions, design documents, querying views and view query parameters, primary aggregate reduces and grouping, eventual consistency of indexes and strategies of use.

* What are Indexes
* What is a Map-Reduce
* Understanding Design Documents
* Admin Console Overview
* Anatomy of Map Functions
* Batch Processing
* Range Querying, Index-Key Querying, Set Querying
* RDBMS Queries vs. Map-Reduce Queries
* Grouping and Group Level
* Eventual Consistency and Stale Parameter
* Tips for Creating Views and Sandboxing Tests

youtube.title: Online Training: Couchbase 104 - Views and Indexing

vimeo.title: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations
vimeo.embed: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations from scalabl3 on Vimeo.

training::couchbase105.title: Cross-Data-Center-Replication (XDCR) and Elasticsearch Integration
training::couchbase105.subtitle: Learn about XDCR architecture and strategies as well as Integrating Elasticsearch
training::couchbase105.description:
Learn the architectural principles behind Cross Datacenter Replication (XDCR), configuration parameters, atomicity implications, and some use cases. Learn how to integrate Couchbase and Elasticsearch for flexible full text searching to compliment Couchbase Views with additional query flexibility.

### CROSS DATACENTER REPLICATION ###

* Cross-Data-Center-Replication (XDCR) Architecture
* Setup XDCR between two clusters
* XDCR Configuration Parameters

### ELASTICSEARCH ###

* Elasticsearch (ES) Integration setup
* Setup Couchbase Transport plugin in ES
* Create replication into ES
* Run Queries against ES and retrieve results against Couchbase

youtube.title: Online Training: Couchbase 105 - XDCR and Elasticsearch

vimeo.title: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations
vimeo.embed: Couchbase 102: SDK Operations from scalabl3 on Vimeo.

training::mobile101.title: Mobile Fundamentals
training::mobile101.subtitle: Learn about Couchbase Sync Gateway, Couchbase Lite and Synchronizing across Devices
training::mobile101.description:
Learn the architecture around the new Couchbase mobile solution using Couchbase, Couchbase Sync Gateway and Couchbase Lite. Understand how it all fits together, and how data is moved from server to devices and back. Learn about sync functions and the parameters for setting up sync channels and permissions. Demo will be creating an instance of Couchbase/Sync Gateway on CouchbaseCloud.com and setting up and running a sample application on a mobile simulator.

* Architecture of Couchbase Mobile
* Understanding Sync Gateway
* Data movement to/from Couchbase Lite
* Understanding Sync Functions
* Setup CouchbaseCloud account
* Run Demo Application on simulator

youtube.title: Online Training: Couchbase Mobile 101 - Mobile Fundamentals
